name: Shin SD Gundam Gaiden: Knight Gundam Monogatari
overview: Shin SD Gundam Gaiden: Knight Gundam Monogatari is a media project within the SD Gundam franchise produced in 1994, centered on Bandai's Gunpla and Carddass trading cards. The series takes place 10 years after the conclusion of SD Gundam Gaiden: Kikōshin Densetsu. The designs of he characters come primarily from Mobile Suit Victory Gundam, with some plot elements coming from Star Wars and Fist of the North Star.
